headline.main: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend
headline.print_headline: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend

lead_paragraph: The R-rated "X-Men" spinoff "Logan" slashed into the weekend box office, opening with a massive $85.3 million in North American theaters, according to studio estimates Sunday, while best-picture winner "Moonlight" got a significant, if far from superhero-sized, Oscar bump.
